title: 美領使：十二港人只為逃避暴政，並非犯法，要求中國馬上放人。

replies.msg:
雖然各國領使未能入內，多得大家令事件持續曝光，至少令到歐美領使都親身去聽審。

十二港人處境嚴峻，我哋趁外媒廣泛報道之際一齊推高曝光率。

Twitter 手足為有重大事件時能及時提供有關推文合集，方便大家即時參考而整咗個channel 。

以後大家無藉口喇
快啲bookmark 佢啦
https://act4hk.com/twitter

入TG bot 拎task 24小時更新：
https://t.me/TwitterHelpBot

Like retweet reply
*如果見到想用嘅圖已經有手足用咗請搵第二張圖
*如果見到已經有好多圖就唔好再放圖，只留文字（短短地都得）
*唔好只係扔低張圖咩字都唔打
*唔知留咩好就like 手足留言或者啲對我哋有利嘅留言

將Twitter 變成日常，每人每日做少少。
每人嘅一小步加埋就係一大步。
我哋唔知做咩先有用，所以咩都試下咩都做下。

replies.msg:
https://www.gofundme.com/f/drew-pavlou-uq-fighting-fund
https://twitter.com/DrewPavlou

Drew Pavlou - 澳洲人，因多次發表言論支持香港/西藏 曾受死亡恐嚇。而家昆士蘭大學或會因Drew 既言論踢佢出校。佢由6月起已多次出席支持香港既遊行集會
而家希望大家幫幫手，支持番佢

Drew has been treated horribly by The University of Queensland. For the crime of speaking out for Hong Kong democracy, he was subjected to a barrage of kicks, punches and death threats. When he refused to back down, the university expelled him on totally faked charges.

This injustice has outraged Australia and the public has been right to demand action. Your support has already shone a light on UQ’s murky, corrupt relationship with China. Now, your donation will take us further.

Your donation will bring the university to account once-and-for-all for their vile dealings with the Chinese Communist Party.

This evil government’s cruelty is almost unimaginable. We’ve seen Tibetans and Uyghurs subjected to rape, torture and genocide. We’ve seen Hong Kongers brutalised in the streets. This government will do anything to destroy democracy and freedom. We have to resist their attempts to subvert our institutions by stealth.

The funds raised through this campaign will be withdrawn by Drew’s team directly and will be used to establish a non-profit organization to fight CCP human rights abuses across the world and defend democracy against CCP subversion. All funds will be directed to the Defend Democracy Alliance in a fully transparent way. This will allow Drew to continue his great humanitarian work and take it to a new level.
